page.title: 09OUR SCHOOL
page.content:
There are three teachers in the school. There are two dinner ladies and one cook. The school is made of bricks. There are forty-one children in the school, seventeen boys and twenty-four girls. There are two classes. There are four live creatures in the school.
The school looks nice with pictures on every wall. There are models made from balsa wood and some sewing pinned on the doors.
The junior class has twenty-six children and the infant class has fifteen children. There are six tables in the junior classroom with four children to each table and one table with six children.
